author: Lloyd Coombes
description:
Assuming you can get your hands on the latest Magic the Gathering release, it’s a very good time to be a Final Fantasy fan. While everyone is cracking packs and building Commander decks, I have my heart set on something a little more refined (and perhaps a little less advisable) - a monored standard deck built around FFXVI’s protagonist, Clive. No really, that's his name - Clive.

Continue reading Forget Commander, Clive is the core of my new MTG Final Fantasy standard deck
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Forget Commander, Clive is the core of my new MTG Final Fantasy standard deck

author: Timothy Linward
description:
On Thursday, UK tabletop wargame and TTRPG publisher Modiphius released free quickplay rules for Hardwar, a 6mm scale sci-fi skirmish game fought between tanks, aerial units, and - of course - mechs. Comparisons to Battletech are inevitable in this genre, but having tested the game at last month’s UK Games Expo, I’m confident in saying this game has something to offer all mech lovers, whether they're diehard mech warriors, or think the genre defining wargame is past its prime.

Continue reading Revitalised mech miniature wargame Hardwar is so much faster than Battletech
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer 40k factions, The best games like XCOM, The best strategy board games
title: Revitalised mech miniature wargame Hardwar is so much faster than Battletech

author: Callum Self
description:
After a disappointing time with Prismatic Evolutions, Pokémon Battle Partners made me fall in love with the TCG once again. It, and its English counterpart with Journey Together, offered beautiful artwork and the return of the Trainer’s Pokémon mechanic, giving me a refreshing experience. However, it has been subject to high prices due to the hype, but you can get a booster box of Battle Partners at a great price right now.

Continue reading Here's your chance to get Pokémon Battle Partners at its cheapest price yet
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets i
title: Here's your chance to get Pokémon Battle Partners at its cheapest price yet
